rows.label: tlk70000075_04_msg001
rows.name:
I was visiting the capital the other day
on business, when I saw someone who
looked just like Meknes from behind.

rows.label: tlk70000075_04_msg002
rows.name:
Of course, it wasn't him at all - it was
an ordinary Iiran woman. When I saw
her face, something came over me...

rows.label: tlk70000075_04_msg003
rows.name:
All my pent-up frustrations suddenly
came pouring out. I think...I said some
terrible things to that poor woman.

rows.label: tlk70000075_04_msg004
rows.name:
I can still remember the look of
shock on her face - there were
tears in her eyes.

rows.label: tlk70000075_04_msg005
rows.name:
How could I be so thoughtless...?
She was only trying to be kind, and to
a strange Superbian soldier no less...

rows.label: tlk70000075_04_msg006
rows.name:
I have to find her again and apologize.
It's the least I can do.
